sentences.text: Many Tennesseans were stunned to hear the news that yesterday morning at 10:18 a.m. a lone gunman walked into a welcoming congregation in Knoxville and opened fire on the congregants who were gathered in anticipation of watching their children perform a scene from the musical Annie as part of the morning services, killing two people and shooting several more in the head before being tackled to the ground.

sentences.text: So once you factor out suicides, and felons being killed that leaves about 3900, subtract about 700 for accidents and you are down to about 3200, now while still tragic, it might well be of a better benefit to do things to control drivers under the influence (DUIs kill around 10,000, and injure thousands of others year in and year out, but we blame the individual, not the car or what they consumed) Also bear in mind that the St Louis Public Law Review estimated that armed citizens stop 400,000 violent crimes per year, and deter an additional 800,000, and that is one of the more conservative studies done on use of guns by law abiding citizens.

sentences.ctext: So once you factor out suicides, and felons being killed that leaves about 3900, subtract about 700 for accidents and you are down to about 3200, now while still tragic, it might well be of a better benefit to do things to control drivers under the influence (DUIs kill around 10,000, and injure thousands of others year in and year out, but we blame the individual, not the car or what they consumed) Also bear in mind that the St Louis Public Law Review estimated that armed citizens stop 400,000 violent crimes per year, and deter an additional 800,000, and that is one of the more conservative studies done on use of guns by law abiding citizens.

sentences.text: I will not allow my children to be victims of terrorist acts committed by a gun-toting madman, nor will I allow them to be a prop for the NRA to sell more weapons to their cult-like masses, nor will I remain silent while the Mike Huckabees of the world to use this tragedy to push a Christian agenda into my public school.
